text: The communication system shall include functionality to transfer stored data to central storage and processing after restoration of the communication.
The Configure/Editors menu item shall provide an interface for the user to enter editor configuration information.
When a user selects the File/Edit menu item, the HATS-GUI shall request that the operating system start a process and load that process with the editor specified by the application configuration.
This feature may be available to both the user and the administrator, to cancel a job or under specific circumstances, change a job parameter.
The BE shall receive incoming data packets from the Correlator to Backend network interface.
Enable agents to unicast a message to other agents within organization.
If the user has the appropriate privilege, the tool requests confirmation to stop diagnostic processing.
The system must allow a member to do statistics on messages issued and received from/to his system.
The administrative interface allows administrative users to update, add, and delete paint information.
A designated constable from each police station constantly interfaces with the courts.
The Citizen Interface module of the CCTNS acts as a conduit for the information exchange between citizens and police units/personnel.
The solution should send alerts (e.g., email, SMS) to the user if the user chooses to whenever any action has been taken on the alert.
The support solution should be accessible to the users both from within the application and also outside the application through a browser interface.
Once the audit trail functionality has been activated, the System must track events without manual intervention, and store in the audit trail information about them.

The System must be able to capture and store violations (i.e. A user’s attempts to access a case to which he is denied access), and (where violations can validly be attempted) attempted violations, of access control mechanisms.
The System must allow a user to be a member of more than one group.
Magistrate, Person responsible for informing the Defendant of their right to an appointed counsel and determination of indigent status.

Ability to create/add a new domain of privacy policies (e.g, Healthcare, financial, e-commerce, federal agency, etc.)
When creating a new account on Web Store it will default as a customer account.
Customers will be able to register, log in, and log out of their accounts.
Customers will be able to add and store products for purchase within the shopping cart.
Customers will be able to confirm the order after checkout.
The interface must remain consistent among various web browsers and be intuitive to the customer.
The Clarus system shall be able to access remotely sensed environmental observations from data collectors.
Any administrative level user or inventory user can edit an asset that belongs to its department
An inventory user should check returned asset and update inventory
The MultiMahjongServer will automate the game initialisation functions (as opposed to the MultiMahjongClient doing them)
The Clarus system shall be able to retrieve environmental data directly from environmental sensor stations.
The Clarus system shall accept environmental data from emergency vehicles.
The Clarus system shall be able to implement quality control rules for each environmental parameter.
The MultiMahjongServer will have a graphical user interface with which the administrator of the server can get log information and change game settings.
Users who create a new game will be able to change the ability level of any CO involved in the game.
The MultiMahjongClient will retrieve other players' changes in the game situation from the MultiMahjongServer.
The Clarus system shall acquire, process, and disseminate hydrologic metadata.
The Clarus system shall be able to communicate with an individual ESS through its native interface.
The Clarus system shall enable environmental data queries by location reference.
The Clarus system shall be able to be hosted at one or more physical locations.
The Clarus system shall be able to publish environmental data at three times the volume rate that it collects it.
The TCS shall allow authorized operators to install software upgrades via CD-ROM as well as other media storage devices.
The TCS shall allow the Operator to fully control the VCR via the TCS Display input device.
The Clarus program shall provide a trained support staff.
The product should allow multiple points to clicked so that multiple names can be displayed.
The VSP will submit the claim to VMIU field office to enter those into the database
All employees shall be allowed to use the Daily Reminders.
Systems supporting OM must have the ability to print questionnaires for multiple uses, including taking to the field, use during phone interviews, etc.
The user shall be able to switch between predefined project lists.
The user shall be able to edit or delete existing programs.
The user shall be able to modify his or her basic account profile.
The user locates a solution to a problem with the help function.
System operator responsible for maintaining executable code, requiring full access to all aspects of the system.
Browse, visualize, and download agricultural modeling data and results
The system shall allow user to confirm the completion of current configuration
The system shall allow user to create profile and set his credential.
The system shall allow user to enter the customer and product information for the support.
The system shall allow user to add/remove products in the shopping cart.
The system shall allow user to select the payment method for order.
The system shall notify the use about the financing request.
The system shall provide multi language support.
The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ETCS is required to be functional to a maximum train speed of 500 km/h.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect probe vehicle data from The Rapid Transit using the “The Rapid Transit” interface.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect weather data from MDOT Aeronautics Automated Weather Observing System (AWOS) using the AWOS interface.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect traffic data from the Statewide TMC system using the Statewide TMC interface.
The DUAP System shall derive traffic data from probe vehicle data.
The System shall provide the capability to operate in an Open Mode, within which authorized customers shall be allowed read-only access to requested Data Products. This is the nominal system mode.
The System shall be capable of rendering Mercator projections.
Accept or reject content or file format.
Other problems will allow rejection of entire package or part of a package, depending on content.
Transfers the Descriptive Information to Data Management.
Maintains the integrity of the Data Management database which contains both metadata and system information.
Allows updates to be submitted in batches.
Able to add and edit terms of agreement, based on access of level of user.
Summarizes reports and provides repository performance information and repository holdings inventory reports to Preservation Planning.
Schedules and performs file migrations.
This allows him or her to manage archived voice clips and to create a cohesive portfolio that actors in the role of professor can use to judge improvement over time.

the actor in the role of course administrator should be able to toggle whether notifications are turned on.

Track the movement of lapsed quantities in an area
The Black Start unit must be capable of starting and energizing the applicable transmission path without assistance from the electrical system.

The professor will have the ability to hold a video lecture for the whole class or have one on one meeting with the students.

The professor will be able to host a network projector and hold a lecture almost the same as in a real classroom, projecting power point slide and all students currently logged in will be able to follow what’s going on in the class.
The user can search for a publication, by typing in certain keywords using logical expressions(eg. AND, OR, NOT,. . . ) and certain symbols (eg.”, ’ ,. . . ).
The user will have access to the Control Panel, from which he will be able to for example edit the user accounts (upgrade, downgrade or delete user accounts).

Customer Service Representative: A member of the Construction Junction staff who works in the customer service desk and performs specific tasks such as constituent and member database management, item returns processing, creating drop-off acquisitions, and others.
The user may perform a search for items by keyword (basic search) and other parameters such as price, date received and/or discount (advanced search).
For unique items, user can accept the suggested price, enter a different one, or leave it blank
Ability to see where your report is in the queue of reports waiting to run.
Ability to set thresholds on the length of time records are locked and provide, for all record types, a list of records in sustained use/locked condition.

The tools shall provide logging facilities, for example, to follow command progression, i.e. process duration, output levels, etc.
The system shall log errors, warnings, and informational messages to an external log file on the application server.
The ELSS must provide the ability to print out the ELSS logbook data (including landing declarations) using an onboard printer.
Any ELSS software updates must not impact upon the ELSS’s ability to meet the requirements set out in this document and other test documentation.
A thermostat unit shall communicate, through wireless signals, with the master control unit.
Mashbot will allow for the association of Mashbot accounts with external service accounts.
The users have the ability to bulk rotate pages in different documents.
